definition: travel across, deny formally (an allegation of fact by the opposing party) in a legal suit
details:
noun
- travel across
= synonyms: traversal
- taking a zigzag path on skis
= synonyms: traversal
- a horizontal crosspiece across a window or separating a door from a window over it
= synonyms: transom
- a horizontal beam that extends across something
= synonyms: crosspiece, trave, crossbeam
verb
- deny formally (an allegation of fact by the opposing party) in a legal suit
= synonyms: deny
- travel across or pass over
= synonyms: cross, track, cover, get over, get across, pass over, cut across, cut through
- to cover or extend over an area or time period
= example: to cover or extend over an area or time period
= synonyms: sweep, span
